Title: The Troops get Married
Writer: Richard Balducci (characters), Jean Girault (story), Jacques Vilfrid (story)
Actors: Louis de Funès, Jean Lefebvre, Geneviève Grad, Christian Marin
Plot: The gendarme Cruchot meets the widow Josepha. They quickly fall in love but Cruchot's daughter doesn't like Josepha and is determined to prevent the wedding by all means necessary.
